0: As a large hotel there is a lack of toilet facilities with just one in the huge lobby bar area and another one shared by all the restaurants
The main lobby bar was the only place for a decent drink and the only pleasant bartender not sure how to spell but mabe

Unfortunately requests made to reception were not followed through and I spent 2 nights without a bedspread and slept under towels finally found a chambermaid who understood and brought the bedspreads from another room
Take the stairs if you are able bodied
But it worked great in the main lobby
The gym is very dirty and unkempt
We had a broken elevator 6 of the 14 nights we were there and being on the top floor was a pain
You can also use the facilities at some other Riu hotels nearby
The hotel could perhaps offer some lessons to their staff above all in reception
Expect the stairs or ask for lower floor room
1: This place is a PALACE beautiful decor hanging chandeliers antique furnishings amazing artwork and that is just the reception area beautiful absolutely beautiful
Lobby area a good first impression
The lobby was large and beautiful very clean and inviting
Spotless from top to bottom lobby restaurants rooms pools grounds theater
Great location best beachfront entrance palms shade or full sun your choice
Always clean great amenities beautiful views and a friendly staff
This one was really beautiful over sized lobby area if you asked me and gorgeous property
The physical facilities offer pretty much whatever you might desire and they are kept up immaculately
Sandy in the main dining hall gave us top notch service for breakfast and dinner and I recommend you look him up if you staying in RIU palace
